snippet: The Korean director Bong Joon-ho announced the deal, for his adventure film “Okja,” which will be co-produced by Plan B Entertainment.
abstract: The Korean director Bong Joon-ho announced the deal, for his adventure film “Okja,” which will be co-produced by Plan B Entertainment.

headline.main: Netflix to Finance Film by “Snowpiercer” Director
headline.print_headline: Netflix, Eyeing Asia,Is to Finance Korean Film
